means: [人名] [马恩岛人、爱尔兰人姓氏] 夸克 Quirke的变体

sentence.Network_en: By a strange quirk of fate they had booked into the same hotel.
sentence.Network_cn: 真是天缘奇遇，他们住进了同一家旅馆。

sentence.Network_en: The spate of storms and hurricanes in recent years could be a statistical quirk.
sentence.Network_cn: 从统计数字上看，近些年来暴风雨和飓风的频发非同寻常。

sentence.Network_en: By a tantalising quirk of fate, the pair have been drawn to meet in the first round of the championship.
sentence.Network_cn: 仿佛是命运的捉弄，这对选手在锦标赛第一轮比赛中就狭路相逢。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 即使如此，这些隐式转换也会引起怪癖（quirks）。 但是当自动转换为字符串时，可能会引起问题。
...它们能够通过检验.这可以使你的网页避免触发浏览器的古怪行为(quirk),而且使它在"屏幕朗读器"和手机上也能正常工作.
现在的浏览器排版引擎支持三种模式：怪异（Quirks）模式、准标准（Almost Standards）和标准（Standards）模式。在怪异模式中…

list.abs: 怪癖模式（quirks mode）：不同的浏览器实现了不同的怪癖行为。Internet Explorer中的怪癖模式会让IE的行为与（包含非标准特性的I…
文档模式：混杂模式(quirks mode)和标准模式(standards mode)。IE还有一种叫准标准模式。
quirk是什么意思... ... by a quirk of fate 由于命运的摆布 bead and quirk 圆凹饰 double quirk-head 双槽圆线脚.
bead and quirk 圆凹饰 bead-and-quirk 凹槽圆线脚 quirk bead 槽隔小圆 quirk float 深槽镘刀 quirk mode 宽松模式 quirk molding 鸟喙形线脚 quirk router.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (as a verb): of unknown origin. The early sense of the noun was 'subtle verbal twist, quibble', later 'unexpected twist'

entry.def: A quirk is something unusual or interesting that happens by chance.

example.ex: By a tantalising quirk of fate, the pair have been drawn to meet in the first round of the championship...
example.tran: 仿佛是命运的捉弄，这对选手在锦标赛第一轮比赛中就狭路相逢。

example.ex: The spate of storms and hurricanes in recent years could be a statistical quirk.
example.tran: 从统计数字上看，近些年来暴风雨和飓风的频发非同寻常。

entry.def: A quirk is a habit or aspect of a person's character which is odd or unusual.

example.ex: Brown was fascinated by people's quirks and foibles.
example.tran: 布朗对人们的种种怪癖十分着迷。

means.word_mean: 2. a narrow groove beside a beading

sentences.sentence: "She quirked her head in a peculiar way"

auth_sentence.content: There's a curious quirk on every official North Korean website.
auth_sentence.res_content: There's a curious quirk on every official North Korean website.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's a curious quirk on every official North Korean website.

auth_sentence.content: Patricia Quirk of Illinois had radiation to treat her endometrial cancer.
auth_sentence.res_content: Patricia Quirk of Illinois had radiation to treat her endometrial cancer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Patricia Quirk of Illinois had radiation to treat her endometrial cancer.

auth_sentence.content: Cool, but probably an accounting quirk rather than an intended principle.
auth_sentence.res_content: Cool, but probably an accounting quirk rather than an intended principle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Cool, but probably an accounting quirk rather than an intended principle.

sentences.en: One of his quirks is that he refuses to travel by train.
sentences.cn: 他的怪癖之一是不愿乘火车旅行。
